Description: Gilded cartonnage mummy-mask of Mareis; obsidian and limestone eyes cased in bronze(lost on left side); Greek text on forehead; painted funerary scenes on front and back.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 100 [72].
Bibliographic references: Stuttgart 2007 / Ägyptische Mumien : Unsterblichkeit im Land der Pharaonen (no. 218)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces 2007 6 Oct-2008 24 Mar, Stuttgart, Württemberg State Museum, Agyptische Mumien: Botschafter aus dem Land der Pharaonen
